attributes.action: Stop forgetting about our ex military and give them support
attributes.background: Make the government take note that we want our ex military helped more and given more support just like the would a refugee

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107425

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
